'''Badlands Treasure Hunter''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Blessed Hamada]]''. The achievements are earned by opening [[chest]]s in [[Gavireh Lajavard]] and [[Realm of Farakhkert]] in the [[Girdle of the Sands]].
